definition: after drinking/under the influence of alcohol
see 茶餘飯後|茶余饭后[cha2 yu2 fan4 hou4]
after wine, spit out the truth/in vino veritas
driving under the influence of alcohol (DUI)

sentences.english: Drink in the deliciousness of good food and good thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 酒後，在美味的好食物和良好的想法。

sentences.english: You know college kids and their drunken exhibitionism.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，大學生和他們的酒後暴露。

sentences.english: Drunk will feed a small sugar taro, sprinkle with laurel pulp, beauty is not to say.
sentences.chinese: 酒後必食一小糖芋頭，澆以桂漿，美不待言。

sentences.english: A few of them were going out later that night for drinks.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，幾個人喝完酒後就外出找樂子了。

sentences.english: This but is her heartfelt words, afterward rarely being wine, easily and then vomited out.
sentences.chinese: 這卻是她的肺腑之言，難得是酒後，輕易便吐了出來。

sentences.english: The team says the accident is a wake-up call to everyone about drinking and driving.
sentences.chinese: 該隊說這起事件是對每一個人關於酒後駕車的警告。

sentences.english: Brazil chose drink-driving reduction and speed management.
sentences.chinese: 巴西選擇了減少酒後駕駛和超速管理。

sentences.english: The maximum penalty before affair-element drunken driving, but now you chase poor criminal responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 過去酒後駕車最多罰款了事但如今要追窮刑事責任。

sentences.english: Drunk driving violates the highway traffic law.
sentences.chinese: 酒後駕車違反公路交通法。

sentences.english: Do you love drunk driving but hate spending the night in the slammer?
sentences.chinese: 你是否喜歡酒後駕車兜風但是惱恨在班房裏過夜？

sentences.english: Many traffic accidents are caused by achohoic drivers.
sentences.chinese: 許多車禍都是因於酒後駕車造成的。

sentences.english: People just having taken alcohol are declined. No smoking after taking seat.
sentences.chinese: 謝絕酒後乘坐，乘坐時嚴禁吸菸。

sentences.english: A. There was another drink-drive accident yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天又出了個酒後駕車的事故。

sentences.english: The steamer of slag, steamed back after the cool, and drunk young music into the cellar for discharge distilled grains.
sentences.chinese: 出甑後的回渣，蒸酒後經揚涼，加曲入窖爲下排糟醅。

sentences.english: Being confronted with the squatty potty for the first time after a few too many rice wine shots on evening I arrived.
sentences.chinese: 在我到達的晚上喝了太多的米酒後，第一次面臨蹲廁。

sentences.english: Drink brings out the beast in him.

definition: to forget one's manners/to forget oneself/to lose self-control (in a situation)
fragment/piece/(of a film) to break in the middle of viewing
elated/light and airy feeling (after a few drinks)/smug and conceited/complacent
to have eaten and drunk to one's heart's content
lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety
as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
to go mad/to go crazy/to lose one's mind
